pageContent:
Dhrumil Goswami
    Software Engineer
Gainesville, FL 32609 | (352) 731-2056 | dhrumil8888@gmail.com
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Software Engineer with over 4 years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in building scalable applications
using Django, Odoo, and PostgreSQL. Skilled in managing the full software development lifecycle (SDLC), cloud deployments on 
AWS, and data management. Proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Known for strong 
problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and effective communication, consistently delivering high-quality solutions and driving 
successful outcomes.
SKILLS
Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript , C++ Operating System: Windows, Linux                                 
Web Technologies: Html, CSS , BootstrapCloud Technology: AWS(Ec2, s3)            
Data Management: SQL, PostgreSQLFramework: Odoo, Django, Flask

Web Technologies: Html, CSS , BootstrapCloud Technology: AWS(Ec2, s3)            
Data Management: SQL, PostgreSQLFramework: Odoo, Django, Flask 
Additional Skills: Pandas, Matplotlib, MVC, Git, GitHub, Gitlab, PyCharm
WORK HISTORY
LogicLoop LLP | Software Developer | December 2022 – December 2023
Loan Management System
Designed and implemented a robust backend system for financial institutions, enabling seamless lending to SMEs and 
MSMEs. This resulted in a 50% increase in loan disbursement speed and a 20% rise in client satisfaction.
Automated document and background processes using third-party integrations in core Python, reducing manual effort 
and increasing efficiency by 40%.
Developed and maintained a CRM system using Python, XML, and JavaScript within Odoo.
Created Next.js UI APIs and implemented complex business logic and payment integration, automating 70% of the loan 
and borrowing processes.

Created Next.js UI APIs and implemented complex business logic and payment integration, automating 70% of the loan 
and borrowing processes.
Deployed the backend on AWS EC2, utilized AWS S3 for document storage, and managed the database with PostgreSQL.
E-commerce Land Platform
Led the development of a full-stack e-commerce platform for land transactions, facilitating sales and purchases of land.
Implemented business rules and calculations in Python and created backend APIs to support front-end interfaces for iOS 
and Android applications.
Developed an admin panel, employee process module, and a new CRM system in Odoo.
Deployed the backend and CRM on Linux servers, with data storage managed via AWS S3.
Apagen | Python/Odoo Developer | December 2021 – September 2022
Backend Development in Odoo
Customized ERP modules to streamline processes and improve operational efficiency, contributing to significant 
business growth.

Backend Development in Odoo
Customized ERP modules to streamline processes and improve operational efficiency, contributing to significant 
business growth.
Conducted source code analysis to ensure optimal functionality and performance.
Streamlined Git repositories by implementing branching strategies and enforcing commit message guidelines, reducing 
merge conflicts by 40% and improving code review efficiency by 30%.
Developed high-quality, customized ERP solutions, including automating inventory management for improved accuracy 
and efficiency.
Project Management and Integration
Provided consultation on Odoo implementation, customization, and optimization to meet client-specific needs and 
enhance system functionality.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather and document project requirements.
Developed and maintained a Shopify connector for seamless data synchronization between systems.
Additional Contributions
Built a basic Django module to extend project capabilities.

Developed and maintained a Shopify connector for seamless data synchronization between systems.
Additional Contributions
Built a basic Django module to extend project capabilities.
Contributed to front-end development to enhance user interface and experience.
Aktiv Software | Python Developer | September 2019 – July 2021
Created and tailored Odoo applications, including successful migration projects, which improved system performance by 
50%.
Developed QWEB and XLS reports tailored to business needs, aiding in decision-making and supporting business growth.
Created customized POS tickets and reports using JavaScript for an optimal user experience.
Conducted source code analysis to enhance application stability and performance.
Managed Git repositories on GitHub and Bitbucket for efficient project execution.
Softvan | Python Developer Intern | August 2018 – August 2019
Managed daily tasks and responsibilities while communicating with instructors.
